Short Round scurries up the ladder and pulls himself up i chamber behind the altar.  He looks at the light flaring the statue of Kali --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy -- !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chains clank and gears grind as the sacrificial frame is over the crevasse.  Stretched out on it, Willie looks hor as she hangs suspended face down above the boiling lava! The frame and victim descend slowly into the crevasse and crowd around the little Maharajah changs louder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short Round dashes across the dark chamber behind the alt peers out and sees Willie disappearing into the crewasse! sees Indiana watching impassively --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No -- Indy -- wake up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then Shorty sees a flaming torch hanging on a wall bracke has an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short Round suddenly darts out onto the altar and Mola Ra him and yells.  Several priests grab for Shorty.  He elud first priest, smashes the second in the stomach with his and runs like a little quarterback toward the fiery torch Short Round snatches the torch from the wall and charges Indiana.  Seeing him coming, Indy's eyes start glowing ye when Short Round runs up to him, Indiana suddenly swings backhands the little guy brutally across the face! The torch flies out of Shorty's hand as he's knocked agai wall by Indy's vicious blow -- Short Round wipes a little from his chin and stares at his hero in wounded disbelief Chattar Lal watches approvingly -- a priest moves toward Chattar Lal looks back toward the crevasse -- Willie hangs on the lowering frame, heat waves rising up scald her skin and she chokes as the sulphuric air burns lungs! Meanwhile Short Round is crawling backwards across the fl a look of terror on his face -- Indiana stalks him, hissi snarling, his eyes lgowing -- Short Round springs to his feet and tries to run -- Indy him and pulls him -- Shorty's hand grabs for another wall and just manages to yank it free! Indiana spins Short Round and clutches his throat.  As In strangles him, Short Round struggles and finally jams the into Indy's side.  The fiery torch burns Indy, smoking as sears his flesh, and he yells in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wake up!  It's just a nightmare, Indy!  Wake up, please Indy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana writhes in pain and Short Round sees the evil yel in Indy's eyes getting dimmer and finally going out.  Now seems like theold Indiana staring at him -- SHORT ROUND (Cont'd) Indy, you back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a priest grabs Short Round and pulls him off Ind

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  Give him to me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short Round is firghtened as Indy grabs him from the prie Indy lifts Short Round into the air --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Indy, no!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sets Short Round down on the brink of the crevasse an from doom.  Shorty looks down at the lava and is terrifie Indiana finally flahses him a quick smile and winks! Then Indiana whirls and punches the priest in the face! Round cheers, realizing that Indiana is back. SHORT ROUND (Cont'd) We got to help Willie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana springs into action, stopping another priest with punch in the stomach.  Then he rushes over to the crankwh pulley platform.  Indy jumps onto it, yanking one priest spills onto the floor. A second priest, who works the controls lowering the sacr frame, sees Indy and releases the crankwheel -- Down in the crevasse, Willie screams as the iron frame su plummets toward the fulminating lava! On the platform, the priest lunges at Indiana -- Indy use man's own momentum to throw him over his head.  Indy then for the crankwheel and manages to stop it -- Down in the crevasse, the fram jolts to a stop only yards the spumes of fiery lava.  The heat is so intense now tha lie's clothes start smoking and she passes out... On the platform above, Indiana cranks furiously, raising crificial frame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chanting stops at the Kali worshippers notice the bat the altar.  The little Maharajah looks concerned and leav shoving through the crowd behind his bodyguards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mola Ram shouts at his priests and another one of them ru ward Indy on the platform.  Short Round dives and tackles priest. Chattar Lal finally leaps onto the crankwheel platform an sees him pull a dagger.  He slashes at Indiana and Indy h let go of the crankwheel -- the gears scream and the chai screech! Below in the crevasse, the iron frame plunges again towar crimson lava! On the platform, Indy hears the frame lowering and looks icked.  Chattar Lal slahses again with the dagger -- keep away from the cogwheel mechanism -- Indy suddenly kicks the dagger from Chattar Lal's hand sl in the stomach and dives toward the cogwheel mechanism. a iron rod and throws it into the gears -- the gears mangle the iron rod but finally grind to a stop ana grabs the crankwheel and starts winding it up furious Meanwhile, Short Round jumps onto the platform with Indy grabs a long wrench.  He starts swinging the wrench, keep last priests off the platfrom. The sacrificial frame finally rises up into view and Indi grabs it and swings it over onto the platform.  He looks lie anxiously as he releases her bindings -- Willie moans and moves her head.  Indy pulls her off the and she starts coughing.  Gasping for breath, Willie ervi fresh air flows into her lungs. Finally Willie opens her eyes and she sees Indiana.  Then notices something else and manages to cry out hoarsely --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look out -- !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chattar Lal grabs a pistol from an unconscious guard and whirls to see him pointing it -- Indy kicks the gun from and suddenly Chattar Lal starts shouting in a terrifying Chattar Lal's eyes glow as he lunges suicidally at Indian tempting to take Indy with him as he dives from the platf Crashing into Indy, Chattar Lal knocks both of them back sacrificial frame which swings out over the crevasse -- Indy manages to dive off the frame just in time.  He grab of the platform as the crankwheel screams and the frame f Looking up from the depths of the crevasse, we see the fr Chattar Lal on it plummeting downward into the sulphurous The frame finally crashes, splashing into the molten lava Chattar Lal's body explodes inot flame friefly -- his fle broiled off in an instant -- we glimpse a skeleton moment and then all is consumed and obliterated by the blazing l scramble over to Short Round who jumps off the platform a follow him across the altar. Indy sees Mola Ram quickly collecting the sacred Sankara Indiana rushes over and spins Mola Ram around -- He slugs the High Priest in the face and Mola Ram keels o backwards against the statue of Kali.  Short Round helps the Sankara Stones into Indiana's shoulder bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short Round, Willie and Indiana rush across the chamber b the altar.  They run over to the ladder and start climbin into the mines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie follows Short Round.  Indiana jumps down last and the ladder away, letting it crash to the floor so they wo followed. They draw the attention of the slave children working in nels around the cavern.  But it's the sight of the approa guard that worries Indy --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, quick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They duck into one of the tunnels.  As they hide, Indy wa the guard passing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're we going to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana looks around at the silent, frightened children w stopped working in the tunnel and his anger darkens --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going to get them out of here -- !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then he looks at the bag holding the Sankara Stones and g still more determined -- INDIANA (Cont'd) And then we're going to get these out of here -- ! (seething) And somehow I'm going to see this place destroyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A gaurd passing hears a voice and stops --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, sir?  Excuse me --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guard turns and looks amazed to see Indy smiling at h the mouth of the tunnel. INDIANA (Cont'd) Listen, I'm from the union and I'd like to talk about the working conditions here.  Could you step inside a minute?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy smiles again and disappears into the tunnel.  In ast rage, the guard draws his sword and goes after Indy into nel -- there's a pause and then we hear the guard yell!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie flattens against the wall as Indiana catapaults th guard past her back into the mine where he's set upon bu of rebellious slave children. The kids swarm over the guard like jackalas and we see Sh pull a key from the struggling guard's robe.

dialogues.speaker: THE MINES
dialogues.text: A key is twisted and the chains are pulled from kids' leg Elsewhere, more chains are unlocked and rattle free.  Lib kids spill out of the tunnels... A guard is tripped and attacked by a horde of ex-slaves.. In another location, kids wrap captured guards in layers chains... High up on a ledge, a fleeing gaurd skids to a stop when kids charging at him.  He sees more kids rushing from beh The guard scrams as he dives off the ledge...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freed children scramble up numerous ladders to escape the below.  They follow the mass of children moving toward th altar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the altar, under the statue of Kali, Willie and Short are helping Indy and some of the bigger children rip down long wooden panel decorated with hideous Kali figures. The childrens' escape is blocked by the chasm separating altar from the deserted sorshippers' area of the temple. swelling crowds of children push and teeter dangerously o edge of the fire pit. Indiana and the others carry the wooden panel through the toward the chasm.  They stand it up and when Indy gives t they drop it -- The panel crashes across the chasm forming a plank across the children now begin running to safety.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last of the children scramble up the ladders and run the front of the altar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The childrens' bare feet stomp across the wooden plank -- them the lava of the fire pit bubbles and shows outbursts flame. Indy stares at the plank and sees that it's starting to s from the intese heat rising up. On the far side of the plank, the children safely across through the deserted temple toward freedom. Willie and Short Round help the last kids out onto the pl Indy sees one child's foot break though the smoldering wo the kid in front pulls the child to safety. Willie and Short Round start to go out onto the plank but shouts at them --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He runs over and pulls them aside -- he steps out onto th and takes a few steps to test it -- suddenly the plank bu into flame in the middle. Indy takes one more step -- and then the plank breaks!  I dives back to the ledge of the altar and Willie and Short grab him and pull him up and the wooden plank plummets in fiery chasm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're we going to do?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's got to be another way out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana, Willie and Short Round run through the deserted tunnels.  They hear a rumbling noise and Indy leads them side tunnel.  They stop and peer into a quarry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A large cavern is the depository for the mine cars rollin with loads of rock.  Emaciated children (still unaware of volt and the other childrens' escape) break their backs s the heavily-loaded mine cars. Thuggee guards supervise the deadening work, while others ate the pulley-and-hoist system used to drag  the cars up sloped dump ramp. Behind this operation, a thunderous waterfall cascades in huge cistern.  From there, chutes deply the rushing water power the large conveyor belt below it. As the cars rise up the ramp, they tip and spill rocks on conveyor belt which carries them toward an awesome stone that rolls relentlessly , crushing the rocks into sand. From the side tunnel, Indiana watches the noisy operation

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those empty cars have got to go out of the mines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie and Short Round watch the children push the empty cars.  The cars gain momentum and roll away down two dark nels. INDIANA (Cont'd) Come on, let's see if we can catch a ride...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tey duck out of the tunnel and run for cover behind a sla Loaded mine cars roaring down from the mines hurtle past crash to a stop against the cars in front. INDIANA (Cont'd) Okay, Shorty -- go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes Short Round who darts out after a mine car roar and dodges across the tracks before the next one descends pushes Willie  into  position and holds her ready --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After another car crashes past, Indy shoves her.  Willie -- her shoe gets stuck and she freezes in the tracks!  Wi sees a rock-filled car blasting down out of a tunnel dire toward her! Indiana dives, knocking Willie safely to the ground on th side of the tracks -- the heavy car hurtles past and cras the cars in front. Indy pulls Willie behind a massive wooden post holding up dump ramp and they hide from a passing gaurd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to get across to the empty cars.  Wait here until I signal you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They watch him run and hurdle a pile of lumber, bound up steps and duck behind a tool shack on the platform.  Indy out and grabs one of the passing slave children. They see Indy put his hand over the kid's mouth and whisp him.  He releases the kid who sneaks away, alerting the o children who start making their escapes into side tunnels Now Indy motions to Short Rounds and Willie to follow.  A start to move out they freeze dead in their tracks and In motions again angrily --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie and Short Round see a guard coming up the steps on other side of the platform.  As the man rises he gets tal taller -- until they see it's a Thuggee giant coming up b Indiana. INDIANA (Cont'd) Come one, what's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana turns and looks into the bare chest of the seven- tall guard.  Indy has to look up to see the man's mean-lo face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see the problem...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana suddenly punches the giant in the stomach -- the does not flinch, he just belches rudely. Indiana growls and winds up to take a killer swing -- he back, cocks his arm -- and suddenly turns and runs away. No dummy, Indy dashes over and picks up a piece of wood. giant starts toward him.  Indy drops the wood and looks a for a much larger piece of wood. As the giant stalks toward him, Indiana raises the large lumber -- Indy suddenly groans, drops the wood and clutch stomach.  Willie and Short Round looks startled --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short Round shakes his head.  They see Indy recover from spasm as the giant rushes him.  Indy jumps aside, landing loaded mine car that is passing by. The car is being dragged up the dump ramp and the giant j onto it after Indiana.  Indy quickly grabs a rock and, as giant rushes him, Indy smashes the rock against the big m skull! Unfortunately, it's the rock that shatters and not the sk Indy dives to the other end of the mine car and lifts a l boulder. Suddenly Indy drops the boulder and grabs him arm, feelin shooting pain again.  Then he yells as he feels yet anoth bing pain in his left leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong with him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shorty is convused and worried -- and then he sees someth looks up and there on a rock-cut balcony over the cavern little Maharajah! The little prince clutches the clay krtya doll that repre Indy.  He jabs it in the leg with a long sapphire-tipped pin. On the mine car, Indy yells and grabs his right leg, whic collapses beneath him.  Short Round takes off.  He dashes the platform toward a bucket-chain carrying spent water b to the cistern. Short Round leaps over the pool of water and grabs onto a He rises up on this make-shift elevator toward the rock b and the malicious little Maharajah. Meanwhile, Indy is on the brink of unconsciousness as the massive hands throttle his neck.  Indy's head hangs over of the mine car and suddenly his eyes widen -- The car with Indy and the giant reaches the peak of the d and its upended -- spilling both of them and a shower of down the conveyor belt! Down below, Willie dodges wooden pillars and weaves aroun quarry equipment, trying to follow Indy's battle with the She trips and swears angrily -- Willie pushes and empty mine car out of her way -- an emp car!  She runs back and starts shoving the mine car along rails toward the conveyor belt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got one!  Indy, I got one!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Near the waterfall, Short Round ascends on the rising buc chain.  Up on the balcony, the little Maharajah chuckles he watches Indiana on the conveyor belt -- The Maharajah lifts the clay doll and viciously jabs the the back of it! On te conveyor, Indiana gets to his feet and then yells a stabbing pain lacerates his back!  He falls and writhed h ly as the giant staggers up the rocky conveyor belt towar Willie shoves the mine car forward.  She sees Indy's desp situation as he's pulled along the conveyor toward the ro crusher!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy, look out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks up and sees Short Round leap from the bucket-ch the balcony.  The little Maharajah's eyes glow fiendishly lifts the clay doll -- and jabs the pin into the doll's f On the conveyor belt, Indy yells agonizingly and clutches stabbed face!  Behind him, rocks explode as they're crush pulverized by the mammoth roller. In front of Indy, the Thuggee giant grabs a pick-axe as t veyor slides past a tool bin.  The giant approaches Indy Short Round dashes across the balcny and tackles the Maha They fall and fight like mortal enemies.  Short Round see little Maharajah's eyes glowing as he punches him in the Only a few feet away from the rock-smashing roller, Indy on his back on the conveyor belt, thrashing in pain, feel Maharajah's pin piercing his face.  The giant raises the above his head and it about to split Indiana in two! On the balcony, the Maharajah drops the doll and Short Ro dives for it -- he grabs the clay doll and pulls out the On the conveyor belt, Indiana is suddenly released from t and looks up to see the giant swinging the pick-axe.  Ind aside at the last minute! The pick-axe cleaves into the conveyor belt and the giant forward -- Indy gives him a helpful kick, sending the gia flying toward the rock-crusher as Indy jumps off the conv belt! Seeing the huge roller looming in front of him, the giant desperately against the movement of the conveyor belt -- gets snagged! The sash around his waist gets caught under the rolling c and he's dragged back under it feet first.  The Thuggee g screams hideously as his body is rolled over and squashed enormous stone wheel! On the balcony, Short Round is jabbing the pin into the s little Maharajah.  The little pricne's eyes still glow ye he hollers --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How you like bing pin cushion, Mr. Rajah-ha-ha?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The little prince rolls on the ground and tries to fight Short Round who keeps jabbing him -- suddenly the Maharaj swings and the pin is accidentally rammed clear through h Shorty sees the pin sticking through both sides of the ki hand.  The Maharajah stares at his pierced hand, gasping astonishment. Short Round notices the yellow glow dying out of the Maha eyes -- just as Indy's eyes cleared after he was released Kali's trance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please -- pull it out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short Round yanks the pin out of the little prince's hand Maharajah looks like he's jsut awakened from a bag dream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was the black sleep of Kali...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They made me do evil things... may lord Krishna forgive me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Indy runs along the catwalk above the conveyor He jumps and grabs onto a cross-bard -- he kicks out with and knocks a quarry guard off the catwalk. The guard flies through the air and topples into the sand where he thrashes around blindly under the sand falling f crusher. Across the cavern, Willie shoves the rolling mine car tow balcony.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get down here, Shorty!  I got us a ride!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie shirls as another quarry guard rushes toward her. yanks the iron brake-handle off the mine car and holds it eningly like a baseball bat -- WILLIE (Cont'd) Come on, let's see hoe hand your head is!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up on the rock balcony, Short Round lowers himself over t The little Maharajah grabs his arm --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please -- listen -- to go out you must take the left tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shorty looks at him and he knows he's telling the truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks pal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to try to find the English soldiers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short Round slips over the edge and slides down a wet sta to the floor of the cavern. There he finds Willie swinging the brake-handle and smash guard in the gut.  The man doubles in pain -- Willie kick putt and he splashes into the pool of water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't appreciate being cooked like a french fry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie, come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie starts pushing the empty mine car with Short Round SHORT ROUND (Cont'd) You do pretty good for a girl!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Across the quarry, Mola Ram and six temple guards run out high platform next to the waterfall.  Mola Ram sees Willi Short Round pushing the mine cat. Mola Ram shouts to his men -- two of them pull pistols an fire! Bullets ricochet off the mine car and Short Round shoves to the far side of the car where they both take cover. Meanwhile, up on a catwalk, a guard slices a sword throug air and Indiana ducks!  The sword slashes into a wooden r and the guard tries frantically to pull it out -- Indiana slams kis knee up into the guard's stomach and th smashes his fist down on his neck -- the man collapses. hears more gunfire. Indiana rushes along the catwalk toward the platform abov edges against the wall below the platform, staying out of as he unfurls his whip. One of Mola Ram's guards fires again from the high platfo Indiana lashes the whip -- the whip wraps around the gunm arm and Indy yanks on it -- The gunman topples through the air and crashes down onto walk.  Indy grabs the gun.  He kicks the guard off the ca and the man falls into the waterfall pool. As the other guards fire down at him, Indiana dodges alon catwalk and fires back at them.  A bullet explodes near M and he ducks back -- Meanwhile, Short Round and Willie have the mine car rolli they jump into it --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy!  Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana spots the rolling mine car racing across the quar takes off and runs along the catwalk -- bullets explode a him, splintering wood.  Indy reaches the end of the catwa Suddenly he dives into the air and catches hold of a bloc tacke!  Indy skids along the pulley system, sliding down toward the mine car in which Short Round and Willie are r Bullets whiz past as Indiana sails in the air above the s mine car - when they are in sync, Indy lets go and drops mine car next to Willie and Short Round! Mola Ram rushes forward and watches the speeding mine car down the track toward the tunnels --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've stolen the Sankara Stones -- they must be stopped!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the speeding  mine car, Indy sees the tracks separatin directions -- one back into the quarry, the other toward nels that lead out of the mines. Indiana lifts a shovel from the floor of the car and swin just in time -- he hits a switch which CLANGS as they spe and the car is shunted tipsy-turvy onto the track toward tunnels. Willie hangs on as the car tears down the track toward th on the right -- and Short Round looks worried --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Indy, it's left tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's too late and they all hold on as the mine car sh donw into the darkness of the echoing tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wind rushes past Indiana as the car descends into the and picks up speed.  Willie hangs on with Short Round -- car roars around a curve and flies fater along the rails.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back in the quarry, Mola Ram supervises the guards as the empty cars toward the tunnel.  Carrying long Khyber rifle jump aboard the cars.  The first one rolls into the dark and the second car speeds after it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two Thuggee cars shoot past, descending into the dark pursuit of the infidels who stole the Sankara Stones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mine car hurtles past.  Indy sits in front, pulling b the brake-lever to control their speed and keep them from ing off the tracks. Expecting trouble, Short Round peers over the back end of car.  Willie ducks low, watching the heavy beams flashing ously close above their heads. Then Willie's eyes go wide and she groans in terror like on a roller coaster as the mine car suddenly plunges down taking their stomachs with it. A gunshot rings out and Short Round sees the first Thugge appear around a curve behind them.  Mola Ram's gunmen sta blasting.  Bullets ricochet off the mine car and Indy yel to Short Round.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come here and take the brake!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short ROund scurries forward and grabs the brake from Ind INDIANA (Cont'd) Slow on the curves or we'll fly off the tracks!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Read you loud and clear, Indy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short Round grins as he holds the brake -- Willie realize this is Shorty's idea of a good time!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up in the quarry, gunmen push a third car toward the tunn Mola Ram stops them.  He shouts and they turn and look in toward the waterfall and huge cistern....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana is crouched in the back of the zooming mine bar b away with the pistol he captured in the quarry. A gunman in the car behind returns his fire, the explosio lighting up the tunnle walls. Indy aims and fires again -- the gunman is hit and knocke in the car.  Another guard with a Khyber rifle moves up t front and starts firing. Meanwhile, as the car goes into a hard turn, Short Round the brake -- beneath the car we see the brake-pad scrapin metal wheel. The tunnel gets lower and Indy has to duck under each bea over and can only pop up to fire between the low beams. The rifleman in the car behind is relading.  Then he lift rifle -- Indy pops up simultaneously and shoots! The gunman is hit, his rifle flies up and his head smashe against the beam hurtling above!  Screaming horribly, the is knocked from the speeding car like a broken doll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up in the quarry, Mola Ram's men swing sledge hammers, ba away at the rock supports under the huge water-filled cis

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana runs out of bullets.  He sees the car behind gett closer.  He tosses the pistol and hits a Thuggee in the h Another Thuggee retrieves Indy's pistol and starts reload Suddenly Indy is being shot at by his own gun and he yell Short Round

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let up on the brake!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy shoves past Willie and takes the brake level from Sh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let her go!  Our only chance is outrunning them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What above the curves?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short Round looks scared as Indy released the brake and t hurtles toward a curve.  They grab the sides of the car a precariously.  Behind them, the curve throws the gunmen f to side in the car following.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy, look out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A sharper curve looms ahead and Indy shoves the brake com off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you doing?!  We're going too fast!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie closes her eyes as they rocket toward the curve. car behind, the Thugge guard at the brake also shoves the off -- and looks extremely worried. Indy's car hits the curve and the centrifugal force lifts side wheels off the rails!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get over on the other side!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie and Short Round jumps over to his side as the car around the curve!  Indy looks back and sees the car pursu is also taking the curve at full speed -- Suddenly the Thuggee car swereves dangerously, the weight too much to the outside -- and the car derails! The car bounces off the tracks and flies through the air siding where is CRASHES against a stone wall in an EXPLOS rock and metal! Pieces of debris pommel the drive of the second Thuggee c he quickly grabs for the brake to slow down and avoid the fate! In the lead car, Indy smiles smugly as Willie opens her e

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One down, one to go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mola Ram's guards continue to bash away with sledge hamme the rock supports under the mammoth cistern.  One of the starts to crumble -- From above, we see the cistern list to one side and water dangerously over the edge as the huge tank creaks and saw

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana and Short Round heft a railroad tie out of th bot the car and Willie watches them lift it onto the back -- As gunfire continues to explode from the car behind them, and Short ROund shove the railroad tie off the back of th The wooden railroad tie falls and bounces back across the The gunmen in the car behind spit it and yell in panic -- Indy and Willie watch the car behind crash into the railr -- but the tie just skids, catches and bounces up and out way like a huge tumbling matchstick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anymore ideas...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah -- this time you're gonna help!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sledgehammers continue -- until two of the rock suppo way!  There are shouts as the guards run for cover. Mola Ram stands on a platform watching the huge cistern s keel over -- the noise is incredible as the colossal tank to the ground! Suddenly a half-million gallons of water explode across t cern and surge in a tidal wave toward the tunnels!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The walls of the tunnel flash past and curves appear sudd of the darkness as the hair-raising chase continues -- Short Round and Willie struggle to help Indy lift a large from the bottom of the speeding mine car. The cars descend again into a stretch of much lower tunne the beams flash past inches above them.  Indy judges the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay  -- one -- two -- NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All three of them groan as they raise the boulder and sho off the back of the car -- ducking instantly to avoid bei capitated by the next beam! Looking back, they see the gunmen pop up between the beam they see the looks of terror on the gunmen's faces as the the boulder in front of them! The Thuggee car hits the boulder and upends!  The guards horribly as the car tumbles end over end, slamming agains tunnel walls, getting ripped to shreds so that finally on pieces of metal, wheels and debris fly like a meteorite s down the tunnel! Willie whoops for joy and hugs Indy who smiles modestly -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, Shorty, hit the brakes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short Round dives for the front of the car and ahppily pu brake lever -- it doesn't work!  Short Round yanks on it -- the brake level suddenly breaks off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy sees Short Round holding up the broken brake lever! crawls quickly toward Shorty while Willie holds on for de Completely out of control, the car hurtles down a decline section where the tunnel if larger again -- Indiana bends over the front of the car and looks underne sees the brake tension hanging loose from the brake-pad. pulls himself back up and looks at Willie and Short Round

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grab onto me -- I'm going to try and slow us down from underneath!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie looks terrified but helps Short Round grab onto In and the back of his jacket.  He skips over the front of t and swings a leg underneath -- Indy is inches above the rails and the rocky ground blurr neath the car as he tries to kick at the brake-pad.  His fall and he bumps along, dragged dangerously for a moment Indy manages to find a foothold on the undercarriage of t As they hold onto him, Indy kicks again and his foot hits brake-pad.  He shoves it and slowly the pad closes agains spinning wheel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie and Short Round look up and see that the tunnel is ahead and the track dead-ends into a stone wall!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks around -- and sees the car rocketing directly to stone wall! Indy's foot starts kicking in high-gear underneath the ca slams at the brake-pad with all his strength -- the pad s against the spinning wheeel and starts sparking! The car seems to slow as it shoots toward the end of the Indy groans and pushes hard against the smoking brake-pad The car slows more and more until it runs down the last f to the dead-end and rolls gently to a stop, just nudgeing back against the wall....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ouch...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie looks faint as Indiana gets to his feet and Shorty out of the car.  They help Willie out and she stands shak

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm okay -- I'm fine -- I love to flirt with death...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana sees that the tunnel ahead continues without any tracks.  Then they hear something -- A strange rumbling sound echoing down the tunnel from beh them.  The walls seem to reverberate.  Looking worried, t start walking away down the tunnel. They walk faster as the noise behind them becomes louder keep glancing over their shoulders --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?...Indy?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana isn't sure and he pulls Willie by the arm and all them start jogging. The rumbling behind them sounds increasingly ominous and they start running full tilt.  They rush down the tunnel awful noise becomes defening!  Willie looks around again slows suddenly -- Willie stops dead in her tracks -- paralyzed -- awestruck

dialogues.speaker: DOOMED
dialogues.text: Willie sees a monster wall of water (released from the qu it thunders around a curver -- a mammoth tidal wave crash tacularly against the opposite tunnel wall! A veritable "tsunami" caroming off the tunnel wall and sp furiously forward like a hydrous Juggernaut!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (frozen in her tracks) Oh... shit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana and Short Round notice that Willie's sloed and th running -- they also see the cataclysm of water crashing tunnel toward them. Indy runs back and grabs Willie.  All three of them take running faster than they've ever run in their lives! The tidal wave smashes forward, booming behind them and I realizes quickly that they're going to lose this race.  S he sees a small side-tunnel in a bend ahead --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There!  Dive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They lunge toward the hole and Short Round dives in it fi Indiana shoves Willie into the hole and jumps in after he as the colossal tidal wave explodes  past!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The small tunnel drops precipitously and they slide down, ed by the small side-current of water that's broken off f main force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They rolls and tumble out of the small chute into a large The roar of the tidal wave sounds distant and receding as catch their breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucky I found a short cut.  Look, there's a light at the end of the tunnel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly an EXPLOSION!  They turn and see the thundering wave crashing around a curve and cascading down the tunne them again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some short cut!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all holler in unison and start running like bats out toward the daylight.  The towering wall of water surges r lessley after them -- The tidal wave looms up to annihilate them as they race t mouth of the tunnel -- and Willie SCREAMS!  Indy grabs he all three of the flail their arms to keep from losing the ance!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tunnel exits midway up a cliff and the three totter p ously on the brink looking down at a 300 foot sheer drop a gorge below! Indiana swings Willie onto a narrow ledge on one side and Short Round after her -- he jumps himself to the other si as the tidal wave crashes past them! The water bursts out of the tunnel -- the gusher spews fo the cliffside into the air as if Hoover Dam just broke lo Short Round and Willie balance on the narrow ledge on one the geyser -- Indy is perches on the ledge on the other s the incredible eruption of water. Willie gets vertigo looking down into the gorge where the crashes at the bottom.  There crocodiles are disturbed an slither angrily. Indy looks up and sees a rope bridge swinging about twent above Willie and Short Round.  Indy shouts across the bla water --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie -- the bridge!  Climb up to the bridge!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie looks frightened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing to it -- follow me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He edges along the narrow ledge toward the bridge and Wil follows him.  Once under the bridge, they start climbing rocks to it. Meanwhile, Indiana is scaling the cliff face to get over water geyser to the other side.  He grabs at scrub brush finds a few perilous footholds as he makes his way to the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie and Short Round pull themselves up at the end of t bridge.  Behind them a dark tunnel runs back into the min What's in front of them is hardly more reassuring -- The rope bridge across the gorge is a century old and def wasn't built by army engineers.  Laying across the two bo rope-spans, worm-eaten and moldy boards offer risky footi Vertical side ropes connect the bottom rope-spans to the per ropes that constitute the dangerous hand-railings. Short Round steps tentatively out onto the bridge.  It ho and he turns and smiles at Willie --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy like pie!  Kid's stuff!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the board under him breaks! Willie grabs Short R before he falls into the abyss!  Looking pale and less co Short Round starts out again and Willie follows his caref They continue stepping across the bridge cautiously, a fe more difficult by the bridge's constant swaying and the h stopping up and down movement. Behind them, Indy finally pulls himself up from under the He stands up and sees Willie and Short Round halfway acro already.  Then he hears something and turns quickly -- he his whip out and ducks to the side of the tunnel as two T guards rush out. Indy cracks the whip, catching the first guard around the the guard spills forward and trips the second guard.  The man tries to stand but Indiana kicks him in the head. The second guard gets to his feet and seings his sword -- ducks, slams him in the stomach and dives for the first g sword.  He grabs it and rolls aside quickly as the second attempts to slice him in two! Indy gets to his feet and immediately finds himself about gage in a sword duel with the enraged Thuggee guard.  Ind at the unfamiliar sword, hefts it, and tries to quickly d the best way to use it -- Suddenly the guard shouts and charges.  Indy decides shou must be the "de rigueur" technique and shouts back loudly two swords CLANG and spark as the duel erupts. Indy flails and feints and the Thuggee guard lunges and s Indy finally gains the upper hand and dispatches the Thug guard who slumps defeated into the dirt. Keeping the sword, Indy starts out onto the bridge, walki quickly as possible across the rickety span.  He hears sh ahead and looks worried then temple guards appear at the of the bridge. The guards suprise Willie and Shorty as they finally get the bridge.  Struggling   futilely with the guards, Willi at Indiana --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy -- looks out behind you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy sees more Thuggee guards rushing out of the tunnel b him.  He turns and sees two of the tmeple guards who capt Willie and Short Round coming across the bridge in front Indy stands helpless in the middle of the swaying bridge guards approaching from both sides, and nothing but heave and the rocky gorge hundreds of feet below! A wind comes up and the High Priest, Mola Ram, appears on end of the bridge.  He stands with the guards who hold Wi Short Round. The wind whips around Indy and he staggers unsteadily on swaying bridge as he watches Mola Ram --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let my friends go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mola Ram shouts in Hindi and the guards start to move tow from both sides of the bridge. INDIANA (Cont'd) That's far enough!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are in no position to give orders, Dr. Jones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana indicates the bag over his shoulder --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want the stones, let them go and call off your guards!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mola Ram motions and the guards move farther out on both the bridge -- suddenly Indiana swings the sword and it cu one of the bottom rope-spans! The rope is half-severed and frays slowly under the tensi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Impressive, Dr. Jones. But I don't believe you would kill yourself!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mola Ram motions again the his guards (looking more nervo step farther out onto the bridge, mvoing closer to Indy f sides. Indy swings the sword again, cutting into the other rope- It, too, is now partially severed and frays slowly.  The jolts and Indy and the guards sway precariously! Suddenly Mola Ram shoves Short Round out onto the bridge. High Priest draws a dagger and pushes Willie onto the swa span, holding the knife behind them both. MOLA RAM (Cont'd) Your friends will die with you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In different times this would be called a Mexican stand-o Indiana looks at the guards in front and behind him.  He Willie and Short Round out on the bridge now with Mola Ra their backs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I guess we're all going to take a big dive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy and Short Round's eyes meet -- and the kid realizes hero isn't kidding.  Willie looks at Shout Round anxiousl notices that Shorty is surreptitiously wrapping his foot rope support. Petrified, Willie also secretly wraps her foot around a r does likewise with her arm --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me the stones!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mola Ram -- you're about to meet Kali -- in Hell!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana swings the sword with all his might -- it whooshe through the air and slashes clear through the top and bot ropes --! Immediately Mola Ram's guards start to flee in panic -- t Indiana swings the sword again and the two ropes on the o side are severed -- The rope bridge is sheared in two!  It breaks in the midd both halves fall apart!  The guards scream horribly in th they plunge down into the rocky gorge! Willie and Short Round cling to their established foothol fall with the bridge toward the wall of the gorge.  Mola spills forward, clutching desperately at the ropes and sl Below them, Indiana has latched onto a rope and swings wi bridge as it hits the gorge wall and hangs vertically now ling from its moorings at the top. There's an instant of suspended animation as all who rema realize they are alive.  Short Round and Willie cling nea top of the now vertical bridge. Below them, Mola Ram clutches onto one of the main ropes directly above him the last of his guards holds on for de Short Round and Willie struggle upwards, clutching ropes stepping on slats.  Finally, Short Round heaves himself u solid ground and turns to help Willie up. Meanwhile, dangling below on the bridge, Indy reaches up grabs Mola Ram's leg.  The High Priest kicks and tries to Indy's grip.  He kicks again and smashes Indy in the face Indy won't let go.  Suddenly the High Priest reaches up a his own Thuggee guard and yanks his down by the front of shirt -- Mola Ram shoves the luckless guard down onto Indy, trying dislodge him by sacrificing the screaming Thuggee.  Indy to hang on.  The Thuggee is less fortunate and falls scre his death. Then Mola Ram looks across the gorge and yells.  Indy see of the last Thuggee guards streaming out of the tunnel -- to be stranded on the far side of the now bridgeless gorg Indy starts climbing up after Mola Ram again.  He grabs a back of Mola Ram's robe and pull him down.  Slipping, Mol turns and it's Indy's chance to punch Mola Ram in the fac Mola Ram's eyes are glowing yellow and he's shouting inco ly.  He grabs the strap of Indy's shoulder bag and stamps dy's hand -- Indy falls! Indiana slips downward, scrambling to catch hols of somet meanwhile, Mola Ram now has the bag with the Sankara Ston Indy finally stops his downward slide and dangles dangero near the bottom of the bridge. Across the gorge, the Thuggee guards run up a path to a s gove of trees growing on a plateau above the gorge.  The have bows and arrows and take firing positions -- At the top of the bridge, Mola Ram keeps climbing until r start poundinghim from above -- Willie and Short Round pe with rocks which he tries to block with his arm. Indiana starts to climb again, using all his strength.  H reaches for a wooden slat -- suddenly a flaming arrow sma into the wood! Indy turns in amazement and sees more flaming arrows rock across the chasm directy for him! Across the gorge, by the grove of trees, a Thuggee priest orders to the archers who continue to launch the flaming Indiana crawls up as the bridge starts to burn from the c ing bursts of fiery arrows.  At the top, Mola Ram reaches perately for a hand old -- Willie smashes his hand with a The High Priest yells in pain and slips down to where Ind him again in the face!  They struggle as the fire burns u beneath them. On the cliff above the fallen bridge, Willie watches the rising toward Indy and Mola Ram as they fight.  Short Rou and sees something --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie, look!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They see horses galloping through a narrow pass -- the Br cavalry is returning.  Captain Blumburtt and the first tr up their forses and dismount quickly. A fussilade of flaming arrows force the British to take c they quickly start firing back at the Thuggees with rifle As the battle above the gorge continues, Indy and Mola Ra below on the dangling bridge -- Indiana sees the High Priest's eyes begin glowing and he insanely.  Mola Ram's hand thrusts out toward Indiana's c Indy yells in pain -- Indy looks down and writhes terrified as he sees Mola Ram starting to enter his chest (as it entered the victim's c during the temple sacrifice)! Mola Ram's finger are inching into Indy's body --  Indy c at Mola Ram's piercing hand, trying to keep the deadly fi away from his heart. Slowly, Indy is able to push Mola Ram's hand away and his withdraw from Indy's chest.  Indiana suddenly slugs the H Priest in the face and grabs for the bag of Sankara Stone

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, the stones are mine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're betrayed Shiva. *(He re- peats in Sanskrit Sankara's warn- ing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Indy pronounces the magical words, the bag begins glow starts to burn Mola Ram as he clutches it -- the stones b spill out of the bag and the High Priest grabs from them. INDIANA (Cont'd) *(He repeats Sankara's warning in Sanskrit)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The blazing stones sear Mola Ram's flesh and he screams i The light suddenly dies in his eyes and for one instant h at Indy as if awakened from a nightmare -- Mola Ram loses his balance and Indy grabs for the stones. manages to clutch only one of them as Mola Ram screams an Indy sees the stone in his hand suddenly cool.  He watche Ram plummeting downward into the chasm and finally crashi the jagged rocks at the bottom. The irritated crocodiles are disturbed once more -- but s come the meal that just dropped in.  Jaws flash and teeth the High Priest's likeless corpse. And Indy's bag with the Sankara Stones sinks into the mur rent and disappears down the river ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana crawls up the burning bridge and Willie and Short reach for him at the top.  They pull him up onto the clif they all look around exhausted -- Across the gorge, more British troops emerge from the min nels to subdue the remaining Thuggee guards on that side. Finally the little Maharajah comes out of the dark mine t He sees Short Round across the gorge -- and bows to thank his help.  On the other side, Short Round waves his cap, him back. Willie stands at the edge of the gorge looking down into er far below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess Mola Ram got what he wanted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not quite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sees Indy reach into his pocket.  He pulls something slowly -- as she watches he reveals a crystal stone -- INDIANA (Cont'd) The last Sankara Stone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Short Round watches Willie take it carefully from Indiana gazes at it and looks delighted --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the diamond hidden inside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie holds the stone up to the sun and it sparkles and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun flares and silhouettes three figures coming over hilltop.  Behinf them we see more smaller silhouettes app over the rise. Indiana, Willie and Short Round walk back down the dirt r Mayapore -- followed by a multitude of children returning their homeland. Willie looks at the changed landscape and seems astonishe barren countryside has been reborn.  They see streams flo beneath green trees, flowers blooming and peasants harves golden grain in the fields.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indiana, Willie and Short Round lead the children down th village road.   Ahead they see villagers rebuilding their tive dwellings. Now they hear shouts of joy from the peasants.  The child returning home start running to meet their parents who ar ing out to greet them. There is laughter and tears as families are reunited.  In sees the old shaman approaching with the chieftain and th village elders. The shaman touches his fingers to his forehead and bows. three travelers return his greeting and the shaman is qui as he speaks to Indiana --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We know you are coming back -- (indicating the countryside) -- when life returns to our village.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a real miracle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you see the magic of the "rock" you bring back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The old shaman smiles wisely at Indiana.  Indy takes the out of his bag and unwraps it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I've seen its power

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willie watches the shaman take it reverently and bow to t The shaman joins the elders and they walk to the village' sacred mound.  Indy and Willie stay back.  They see him k replace the stone in its niche.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last Sankara Stone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And they don't even know what it really is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling at her) Well, you didn't get your prince, and there goes your diamond.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't do so well yourself. Finding that stone could've got- ten you all the fortune and glory you were talking about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's still a long way to Delhi. Who knows what might happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks at him like he's crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no, I'm finding a native guide who knows the way.  No more de-  tours for me, thank you Dr. Jones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns and starts walking away continuing to complain WILLIE (Cont'd) If you think I'm going to Delhi or anyplace else with you, after all the trouble you've gotten me into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the bullwhip CRACKS and wraps around her waist. tled Willie looks angry as Indiana reels her in, pulling ward him and into his arms.  But when he finally kisses h doesn't seem to mind at all... Short Round shakes his head, but looks sort of pleased. turns away, his face lights up! Short Round runs toward the sunset, toward the three elep being brought back to the village.  The baby elephant sta walking faster, as if he recognizes Short Round running o meet him...
